Ini Rekomendasi Lengkap Ombudsman Terkait Peristiwa Listrik Padam Massal
07 Nov 2019, 12:52 by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - Ombudsman melakukan investigasi atau rapid assesment terkait peristiwa padam listrik massal (blakcout) di DKI Jakarta, Jawa Barat, dan Banten beberapa waktu lalu. Ada sejumlah maladministrasi yang ditemukan Ombudsman.
Temuan maladministrasi terkait blackout, yaitu PT PLN (Persero) melakukan kelalaian dalam pemeliharaan dan pengawasan terhadap pohon yang telah melewati Jarak Bebas Minimum di sepanjang jalur transmisi. PT PLN (Persero) juga melakukan penyimpangan prosedur dalam pengoperasian Gardu Induk Tegangan Ekstra Tinggi (GITET) 500 kV Pemalang yang menjadi faktor utama pemadaman total (blackout) pada tanggal 4 Agustus 2019.
Selain itu, PT PLN (Persero) tidak optimal dalam proses antispasi terjadinya blackout. Ombudsman juga menemukan belum optimalnya pelibatan kementerian/Iembaga serta pemerintah daerah dalam upaya pencegahan terjadinya blackout. Terakhir, maladministrasi ditemukan pada pola ganti rugi yang belum memadai kepada masyarakat terdampak.
"Berdasarkan hasil temuan lapangan, analisis, dan maladministrasi yang terjadi, Ombudsman RI menyampaikan saran sebagai bentuk perbaikan tata kelola pemerintahan khususnya di bidang ketengalistrikan," kata anggota Ombudsman RI Laode Ida di kantornya, Jalan HR Rasuna Said, Jakarta Selatan, Kamis (7/11/2019).

This Ombudsman Complete Recommendations Regarding the Mass Power Outages
Nov 7 2019, 12:52 AM by Nur Azizah Rizki Astuti
Jakarta - The Ombudsman conducted an investigation or rapid assessment related to the events of mass electricity outages (blakcout) in DKI Jakarta, West Java, and Banten some time ago. There are a number of maladministrations found by the Ombudsman.
Maladministration findings related to blackout, namely PT PLN (Persero) neglected the maintenance and supervision of trees that have passed the Minimum Clearance along the transmission line. PT PLN (Persero) also deviated procedures in the operation of the 500 kV Pemalang Extra High Voltage Substation (GITET) which was the main factor in the total blackout (blackout) on 4 August 2019.
In addition, PT PLN (Persero) was not optimal in the process of anticipating the occurrence of blackouts. The Ombudsman also found that ministries / institutions and local governments had not been optimally involved in efforts to prevent blackouts. Finally, maladministration is found in inadequate compensation patterns for affected communities.
"Based on the field findings, analysis, and maladministration that occurred, the Indonesian Ombudsman delivered a suggestion as a form of governance improvement, especially in the electricity sector," said RI Ombudsman member Laode Ida in his office, Jalan HR Rasuna Said, South Jakarta, Thursday (7 / 11/2019).
